Calendar

Class MonthlyCalendar_calendar

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • Calendar.MonthlyCalendar_calendar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class MonthlyCalendar_calendar
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    this is the calendarPart, each day will store conversation history, which is text file, and when user clicks the day label, the file list will appear.
    Author:
    Shuai_Huang
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
